original_text: Then Saul dressed David in his own tunic. He put a coat of armor on him and a bronze helmet on his head.
korean_text: 이에 사울이 자기 군복을 다윗에게 입히고 놋 투구를 그의 머리에 씌우고 또 그에게 갑옷을 입히매

sentences.original_text: Then Saul dressed David in his own tunic.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 사울은 다윗을 자신의 튜닉으로 입혔다.

sentences.original_text: He put a coat of armor on him
and a bronze helmet on his head.
